column1: alda is a noun meaning "tree" in Quenya.
column3: The names of the letters  The genitive plural is aldaron.  Compare with galadh in Sindarin.

column1: Image:Alda.gifAlda is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-eighth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  In written Quenya Arda is used for LD.  In other modes this letter represents voiceless L (or LH).
column3: The additional letters  The Westron name for this letter is Lhó.See Westron Tengwar

column1: The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme GALÁD.
* http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist edited by Helge Fauskanger
